name: Ecchi Beauties 2
description:
Ecchi Girls is a very addicting puzzle game in which you must solve puzzles of lovely girls with 40 tiles.

The game has an amazing soundtrack, 10 levels with girls in HD Quality.
This said the game is a perfect way to relax from a hard day at work.

Features

  • 10 levels of beautiful girls
  • Relaxing music and gameplay
  • all images in high HD quality
  • makes you forgot all your sorrows

Game Modes

  • Puzzle Mode
  • Gallery Mode

Thanks to the artist "bachledn" for the amazing images 🥰
